description: This Java class 'HelloController' is a Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for the notesbackend application, including a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for notesbackend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome string message indicating the server is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects clients to the Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the application health status as 'OK'.
